inclusion.criterion: Inönü University Faculty of Medicine Neurology Department of patients with ischemic or hemorrhagic stroke diagnosed by department
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Will be able to adapt to the exercise program
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: To be involved in voluntary work
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Individuals who have been given their informed consent will be included in the study
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Having symptomatic lesions (abcess, tumor) with excessive bleeding risk or stroke
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: If the training does not fit such as confusion or coma
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of hypertension, hyperlipidemia and hypothyroidism. He smokes cigarette 1 pack per day for 40 years and alcohol consumption of 5 to 6 beers per week.
